definition: to attack/to inherit/classifier for suits (esp. of funeral robes)
to plagiarize/to copy/to attack the flank or rear of an enemy
to carry on as before/to follow (an old custom etc)
to invade/(of a storm etc) to strike/to hit
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
to follow old patterns/to imitate existing models/to continue along the same lines

sentences.english: The three side not to worry, thirteen hit Fuping hou.
sentences.chinese: 七國三邊未到憂，十三身襲富平侯。

sentences.english: No one was prepared when the storm took its course and flooded the small town.
sentences.chinese: 暴風雨在大家都沒有防備之下來襲，淹沒了小鎮。

sentences.english: Grief strikes when one comes home to the empty house.
sentences.chinese: 而當一個人回家後面對空空的房間時，悲傷纔會來襲。

sentences.english: Van Gogh was undoubtedly influenced by the Impressionism that swept the city's art world.
sentences.chinese: 梵高顯然深受當時襲捲巴黎藝壇的印象派畫風影響。

sentences.english: A huge storm started to pass by Bay area since last night.
sentences.chinese: 一陣暴風雨從昨夜就開始襲捲舊金山灣區。

sentences.english: Typhoon Muifa to bring gales, rain to China.
sentences.chinese: 颱風“梅花”登陸可能在中國登陸，大風暴雨將來襲。

sentences.english: He jumps back as several of the other heads lunge.
sentences.chinese: 當好幾個頭突然襲來時，他趕緊跳回閃躲。

sentences.english: A painful hush seized the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 一種死一般的寂靜襲捲了人羣。

sentences.english: The dahlias died back when that first cold spelled.
sentences.chinese: 第一次寒潮襲來時，大麗花全都凋謝了。

sentences.english: The dahlias died down when we had the first cold spell.
sentences.chinese: 第一次寒潮襲來時，大麗花的枝葉枯萎而假死了。

sentences.english: The onslaught of problems has overwhelmed Beijing's damage-control efforts, experts say.
sentences.chinese: 襲問題已經蓋過北京的傷害控制工作，專家們說。
會有一場暴風雨襲捲這裏麼？

definition: to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
to attack/to accuse/to charge/an attack (terrorist or military)
to startle/to be frightened/to be scared/alarm
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
